text: en.     - Childhood brain tumors may cause signs or symptoms that begin before the cancer is diagnosed and continue for months or years.    - Some treatments for tumors cause side effects months or years after treatment has ended.     - Five types of treatment are used:          - Surgery (resection)     - Surgery and radiation therapy     - Surgery with cyst drainage     - Chemotherapy     - Biologic therapy        - Patients may want to think about taking part in a clinical trial.    - Patient
